findings.title: Unnecessary condition checks
findings.description: Many if statements' conditions will be checked again by their following SafeMath operators, which can be removed for gas saving.

findings.title: Outdated version of Solidity
findings.description: The required version of Solidity in the TRUSTK contract source code is 0.4.8, which is outdated.

findings.title: Typo in getRemaningTokenSale function
findings.description: There is a typo in function name in file Sale.sol, the correct function name should be getRemainingTokenSale
